message: After I take my medicine and my headache finally starts to subside, I turn to Granny. There's something I need to know.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Granny, can I ask you something?"

name: タエ
message: "What?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Was Mizuki... really the person who kidnapped you?"
She looks down at the teacup in her hands.

name: タエ
message: "Yes."

name: タエ
message: "He asked me to come with him, saying it was about you."

name: タエ
message: "I thought there was something off about him from the start, but I wasn't expecting him to gag me and throw me into a car."

name: 蒼葉
message: "So it was him... But why you?"
She stays silent for a while, her face shadowed, before opening her mouth to speak.

name: タエ
message: "Aoba. And the rest of you too."

name: タエ
message: "First, I guess I oughta thank you. Wouldn't be here if you all hadn't come."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Granny..."

name: タエ
message: "I have something very serious to tell you. Honestly, I wasn't sure if I would ever tell you... I'm still not sure this is the right decision."

name: タエ
message: "But considering what's coming, I think it's better for you to know."

name: タエ
message: "So listen up."
Everyone gives Granny their attention.

name: タエ
message: "First, the reason Mizuki kidnapped me. ...Someone was controlling him."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Morphine, right?"

name: タエ
message: "Yes, but this Morphine is a little different from the one you're thinking of. This is just speculation, but I believe they're working for the Toue Corporation."

name: 紅雀
message: "Toue?"

name: ノイズ
message: "The old fart who bought this island and built Platinum Jail?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "But what does Morphine have to do with Toue?"
Granny stares at us for a moment, like she isn't quite sure what to say, then looks down at her teacup again.

name: タエ
message: "...I used to do research for one of Toue's labs. That was over twenty years ago now."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You... worked for Toue?"

name: タエ
message: "Yeah. Back on the mainland. I only found out about the lab's connection to Toue much later, though."
